channel.title: HELP JAVA hacker in server ! <----------
channel.description:
hello plzz help me a guy ruining my server he say he does it with jdk :s he can pickup items he want and cna unjail himself , and he can tele while jailed
hes is jsut a player ;S and when i ipban him he just get other ip he said the problem was with pickup system in the source.java :S and i had to recode it... but idk howw :S plzz help cuz i closed my server for now cuz hes ruining itt :S he keeps spawning items and unjail himself and he can atk any npc like shops etc :S
plz help me with recoding pickup thing in source :( ( it isnt the command::pickup) plzz helpp i am soo desperated
its an delta 2spced i guess help!!

item.title: HELP JAVA hacker in server ! <----------

@Sagi wrote:

You need to change UID and stuff. Here’s the guide: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=444519.0

item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

Disable cheat clients from connecting to the server, I can guarentee he is using one. There was a guide somewhere on how to do this, you will have to find it.

and he did say something like moparscape but not know it for sure
